wikipedia_page.main: Chard Hayward, born Roy Hayward, (born 1949) is a Welsh-born Australian television actor, director and producer, he is best known for his long-running role of camp barman Dudley Butterfield in the 1970s television soap opera Number 96, he had previously appeared in a small role as a hippie in earlier episodes. Since the early 90s he has been based in the  US.
